ygData.messageBody:
kim@... wrote:

> From: <kim@...>
>
> On Thu, 30 Sep 1999, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:
> >
> > No easier than snare/bow kiting which is already contained in that class, or
> > sow/bow kiting which merely takes a duo. Although we would get it much
>
> This is a central distinction in the kiting issue. Snare (and
> root) has to be cast on the mob, and thus can be resisted.
> SoW and Accelerando are cast on the kiter, and thus cannot be
> resisted.

Actually, I see a lot of rangers level 39+ kiting with bows, using Snare and
Spirit of the Wolf, both of which they can cast.

More likely the reason bards do not get this ability is a balance issue along the
same lines as why we do not get double attack, paladins do not get dual wield and
rangers cannot wear plate.

Jyzan
